title: What're you hiding Riot??
body: So recently loads of people have been having unprecedented lag spikes and random DC's, all of which started happening around the same time. Riot when are you going to fix this, its become impossible for some people to play and its ridiculous. It doesn't matter if someone accidentally tripped over the server in Chicago or whatever but i think everyone deserves answers as to why with little internet lag their League client suffers from lag and DC issues

replies.body:
Ahhhh a lot of these recent issues with ping skyrocketing has turned out to be a case of packet loss. Basically, that means that part of your connection was being lost or corrupted before it was able to reach our servers, but let's be sure to double check your issue as well. 

Grab some of your recent network logs from a game that had some crazy lag spikes and let this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan them. Take a screenshot and post it here so that I can get to the bottom of this for you!
